attributes.action: intervene in Network rails decision to make over 800 redundancies of dedicated and skilled railwaymen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is to ensure that the railways remain safe and punctual something which you will all agree is worthwhile. it is the best its been since 1946 don't let it slip backwards towards the Tory years (remember oldoak common?)
